tool.name: Nomad MonteCarlo
tool.description: Run McStas simulation using NOMAD_NDIP instrument
tool.command:
#set $instrument_code_path = "$instrument_code" if $instrument_code else "/src/Incident_beam_MCstas/Incident_beam_MCstas/NOMAD_NDIP.instr" #set $spectrum_file_path = "$spectrum_file" if $spectrum_file else "/src/Incident_beam_MCstas/a1G0AD-2-f5.dat"
# Create the symbolic links using the determined paths ln -s "$instrument_code_path" "$instrument_code_path.name" && ln -s "$spectrum_file_path" "$spectrum_file_path.name" &&
mcrun "$instrument_code_path" -d \ s3l=$s3l s3r=$s3r s3t=$s3t s3b=$s3b \ s4l=$s4l s4r=$s4r s4t=$s4t s4b=$s4b \ --ncount=$ncount --dir=outputs && (mv outputs/*.mcpl.gz $out_mcpl || true)
tool.help:
**Nomad MonteCarlo**
This is a Galaxy tool for Nomad MonteCarlo.
For more information, see the repository: https://code.ornl.gov/ndip/tool-sources/direct-geometry-spectroscopy/neumatix/nomad-montecarlo
